Send notice to Maria.description: Sends stored notice (vault_001) to Maria via configured delivery channels.

Track delivery for heater invoice.description: Lookup shipment tracking status for the heater invoice.

Read inspection notice aloud.description: Use TTS to read the inspection notice in the selected language.

Open vault entry for Unit 3B.description: Open the document vault entry for Unit 3B.

Start notarization flow.description: Begin in-house or 3rd-party notarization for a document.

View Lease Agreement.description: Open the lease agreement modal (multi-language help text available).

View Eviction Notice.description: Open the eviction notice modal (shows rights and support info).

Send Formal Notice.description: Send a formal notice (e.g., eviction) using configured delivery methods.

Request Notarization.description: Request notarization for the selected document.

Track Certified Mail.description: Track certified mail deliveries by delivery id or tracking number.

Switch Language.description: Switch the UI/reader language; the voice command should include the language code or name.
